dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3191 IH: Defund the OTF Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles (for himself, Mr. Higgins of Louisiana, Mr. Perry, Mrs. Boebert, and Mr. Gosar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the availability of Federal funds for the Open Technology Fund, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defund the OTF Act of 2023.

section.header: Prohibition on availability of Federal funds for Open Technology Fund
section.text: No Federal funds may be made available for the Open Technology Fund established under section 309A of the United States International Broadcasting Act of 1994 (22 U.S.C. 6208a).
